title: ICYMI - Janet Mock Discusses Putting Transgender Characters Front and Center with "Pose" (Rebroadcast)
itunes:title: ICYMI - Janet Mock Discusses Putting Transgender Characters Front and Center with "Pose" (Rebroadcast)
description:
Trevor talks with writer, director and producer Janet Mock about her groundbreaking series "Pose," which focuses on transgender women of color in the 1980s. Originally aired May 20, 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
